commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 72 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

fragments.text: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 72 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: We have a Discord server and there are currently some polls up for which game to be played after this (In roughly 4 months after Super Mario RPG ends, date yet to be defined) and for how much extra time Super Mario RPG should have for post game and sidequests, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK

message.body: Not sure how to play? You can type !help or !commands in chat at any time to have a help message sent straight to chat.
